name: Mr.Trust
greetingText: Btw I really like this new name Jantuu!
wishText: Hurry up and become a millionaire so I can shop till I drop-MY FUTURE SUGAR DADDY;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to U JAN!!  BAR BAR DIN YE AYE blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But thenn I stopped ,i thought after all your girl is an ex-programmer
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it or nott.
replayText: and i miss you jantuu...see you soon...LABUUUU.
